content.rendered:
Install Bibledit on iOS

Install Bibledit via the App Store. This works on an iPad or an iPhone running iOS 12 or higher.

Hint. Switch off backup of Bibledit to iCloud. iCloud has nothing to do with Bibledit Cloud. Bibledit Cloud already stores all the data of Bibledit iOS. It could happen that there is an automatic backup feature of iOS to iCloud which can clash with the data on Bibledit Cloud . 

Home
Review
